channel.title: How do i use my compiler?

item.title: How do i use my compiler?
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

Lol wow, a family reunion or what?
try this compiler.

@echo off COLOR 05 title Death Realm echo \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\-/////////////////// echo Skullkiller112's File's are being compiled echo ////////////////////-\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\ "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls COLOR 05 echo --------------------------- echo \\\\\\\files compiled.../////// echo --------------------------- pause

Read full topic

item.title: How do i use my compiler?
item.dc:creator: @skullkiller122 skullkiller122
item.description:
@skullkiller122 wrote:

im kinda new with server making but i know the basics but i really dont know how u use compiler and idk if its true or not that u need to use compiler to make an update for your server can u help me this is my compiler atm below…

@echo off
title Galkon’s Compiler
echo Fast and Simple Compiler
echo By Galkon
“c:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\jvac.exe” -cp . *.java

echo Server Compiled! (if no errors occured or notes, it compiled)

pause

Read full topic
